blogs.title: How to use Prettier as a Github Action
blogs.description: Prettier is a great tool to format your code. In this article, I will show you how to use Prettier as a Github Action.
blogs.bannerAlt: Image of a website with the Prettier logo and the Github logo, styled in a robot-like way
